1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Family Time with Kapil Sharma (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Kapil Sharma is back in an all-new avatar with Family Time With Kapil Sharma. Navjot Singh Sidhu returns to laugh out loud on Kapil Sharma's witty anecdotes. In this show watch out for your favorite character Bumper, played by Kiku Sharda, and Chandan Prabhakar. Also making a special appearance on the show is Ajay Devgn, on the heels of the release of his new film, Raid (2018). Stay tuned as Kapil Sharma redelivers laughter on your screens and into your lives.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Family Time with Kapil Sharma (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Kapil Sharma is back with another episode of Family Time With Kapil Sharma where he shares his own childhood stories with the audience with his witty anecdotes. Bumper comes with a bow and an arrow. Chandan Prabhakar comes in asking for a washing machine and Kapil flirts with Neha. Abhay Deol and Patralekha promote their upcoming movie Nanu Ki Jaanu. Also find out who is Kapil's new capsicum.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Family Time with Kapil Sharma (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Kapil Sharma commences the show without Neha Pendse. Navjot Singh Sidhu proposes to call Neha. Noticing his excitement, Kapil seizes a point to taunt Sidhu Paaji. Moments later, Neha Pendse's ravishing entry leaves everyone love-struck. The duo then take turns and welcome families to come and engage in contrasting games and win multiple gifts.

imdb.plot outline: Family Time With Kapil Sharma is an Indian Hindi stand-up comedy and game show which premiered on 25 March 2018. The show is broadcast on Sony TV. Neha Pendse is the co-host of this show while Kiku Sharda and Chandan Prabhakar appear at regular intervals to crack jokes and participate in the games that are being played. Family members selected from all over India participate in the show and play games to win prizes.
